name: Monolith Tank
overview: A vertically scrolling Shoot-'Em-Up Construction Kit based game where you and your buddy take on jets, other tanks and fortified positions while avoiding or destroying tank traps that block the way and limit maneuverability. One or two can play and it supports simultaneous 2 player, which is a real blast. Published in ECP's "War Games Pak" compilation.
publishers: ECP (Entertainment and Computer Products Pty. Ltd.)
